column1: We love our dogs. They love to race.

column5: Owned/Raced by: A Bradshaw & P Seque

column1: HEAR THIS (2) - faltered in its gait early stages losing ground with the field. Referred to the Veterinarian where it was reported to have a torn left gracilis muscle.
CHITINA TIN (4) - collided with TREVILLE early stages.
HOMEBUSH TESAN (5) - checked from behind entering the bend losing momentum.
TREVILLE (6) - collided with CHITINA TIN early stages.
KING TOLIMAN (8) - came down the track in the run to the bend forcing CHITINA TIN down the track. Awkwardly placed on heels entering the bend. Checked off heels rounding the bend.

column5: Owned/Raced by: Pave HQ Shirley Boys Syndicate

column1: SOUFFLE SUE (2) - boxed first. Hampered early stages.
LISA'S BOY (3) - placed in restricted room early stages losing ground.
HORSE RANGE JIM (4) - forced down the track early stages contacting inside runners.
GOLDEN BAY (5) - slow early. Placed in tight quarters entering the bend losing ground.
FRIZZLED (6) - came down the track abruptly in the run to the bend placing inside greyhounds in difficulty. Checked inwards off heels exiting the bend.
BELFAST DEMO (1) - jostled with AMURI GEORGE in the run to the bend. Shifted up the track rounding the bend being dragged down by HIGH DREAMER. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury.
FIRED UP JED (2) - placed in restricted room entering and through the early stages of the bend.
AMURI GEORGE (3) - jostled with BELFAST DEMO in the run to the bend.
HANKENSTEIN (4) - squeezed for racing room early losing ground. Held up rounding the bend being awkwardly placed on heels. Again squeezed for racing room later stages of the bend.
HIGH DREAMER (5) - squeezed for room early losing ground. Lost further ground when climbing on heels rounding the bend.

FOREHAND RAID (6) - Stewards queried the improved performance of this runner with trainer Mr J Dunn. Mr Dunn advised the Stewards that greyhound had been receiving interference in it's previous starts and was better suited when leading.
CREME BRULEE (2) - bumped on several occasions with OPHELIA ALLEN in the run to the first bend.
OPHELIA ALLEN (4) - bumped on several occasions with CREME BRULEE in the run to the first bend. Hampered and lost ground entering the first turn.
DYNA MONTY (5) - briefly contacted from OPAWA MAY early stages. Awkwardly placed between runners rounding the first bend. Awkwardly positioned to the outside of OPAWA MAY rounding the final bend.
OPAWA MAY (6) - bumped briefly with DYNA MONTY early stages. Bumped with DYNA MONTY first bend losing momentum. Hampered when awkwardly placed to the inside of DYNA MONTY final bend.
TAIERI TERRA (4) - shifted ground outwards and became awkwardly placed to the inside of OPAWA VINNY when entering the bend.
OPAWA VINNY (6) - jostled with GOLDSTAR TROOPER entering the bend. Lost ground when awkwardly positioned to the outside of TAIERI TERRA entering the bend. Checked from behind rounding the bend.
GOLDSTAR TROOPER (8) - jostled with OPAWA VINNY entering the bend. Checked off heels rounding the bend.
SMASH ATTACK (10/1) - made heavy contact with the running rail entering the bend losing ground. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury.
SHE'S FOR US (1) - hampered prior to the first bend.
OSTER BALE (2) - slow early before being placed in restricted room and having to check off heels.
RINGSIDE (3) - hampered in the run to the first bend when racing to the outside of OSTER BALE.

column7: Trained by: AL Hart & KM Taylor

column1: MAN OF LETTERS (1) - awkwardly placed on heels entering the bend.
LITTLE KRAKATOA (3) - squeezed for room early stages checking up the track. Collided with HOMEBUSH MONKEY prior to the bend.
HOMEBUSH MONKEY (6) - contacted from the inside by LITTLE KRAKATOA prior to the bend.

column5: Owned/Raced by: I Pave Shirley Boys Syndicate

column1: REPLICA RANGO (3) - was declared a late scratching by order of the Stewards after escaping its handler and finding its way to the lure post stirrups and consequently running free for a period. This greyhound was subjected to a Veterinary examination and cleared of injury.
ALOTTA TALK (4) - pushed down to the rail early stages being unable to improve as a consequence.
MIGHTY MUSCLE (8) - held up for racing room entering the final bend and through the early stages of the run home.
SELECT TRICK (1) - awkwardly placed to the inside of HILTON FORABET prior to exiting the bend checking outwards and losing momentum. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury.
ULYSSA BALE (2) - checked outwards off heels rounding the bend hampering outside runners.
FLEUR DIOR (3) - awkwardly placed to the outside of ULYSSA BALE rounding the bend and lost momentum.
PITA RAMOS (5) - held up for racing room after being forced down on heels rounding the bend.
KIWI GUNN (6) - hampered when awkwardly positioned on heels rounding the bend. Placed on heels and had to steady for a stride entering the home straight.

column3: NZ Racing Series Distance FinalNew Zealand Racing Series

column5: Owned/Raced by: G K Turnwald & G A Cleeve

column1: HAZE ADAMS (2) - checked from behind in the run to the finish.
GOLDSTAR SYDNEY (3) - bump briefly with KNOW TALENT prior to the first turn.

KNOW EQUAL (4) - began awkwardly. Checked outwards off heels shortly afterwards making a forwards run to race handy going into the first turn. Weakened rapidly racing down the back straight on the last occasion finishing a distance from the winner. Stewards spoke to kennel representative Mrs G Turnwald in relation to the performance of this greyhound. Ms Turnwald explained that in her opinion the distance of the race had taken its toll after working hard through the early and middle stages. A post race Veterinary examination revealed signs of mild tie up.
KNOW TALENT (5) - bumped with STUDENT LOAN and GOLDSTAR SYDNEY prior to the first turn before clipping heels with STUDENT LOAN losing ground.
STUDENT LOAN (8) - bumped with KNOW TALENT prior to the first turn before being checked from behind losing momentum. Awkwardly positioned on the heels of HAZE ADAMS in the run to the finish.

column3: Active Electrical Christchurch 2020 N.Z. St Leger Group 1

column5: Owned/Raced by: D Lane & J Arthur

column1: GOLDSTAR TRUMAN (2) - was a late scratching at kenneling on Veterinary advice.
UTHOR BALE (1) - contacted from the outside early stages by GO VEGAS
GO VEGAS (4) - bumped down the track early stages colliding with UTHOR BALE. Hampered for racing room entering the first turn and again rounding it. Placed in tight quarters entering the final bend.
PUNTERS A HERO (5) - squeezed for racing room early stages. Checked from behind rounding the final bend.
OPAWA TODDY (6) - shifted down the track early stages hampering inside runners. Awkwardly placed to the outside of GO VEGAS rounding the first. Placed in tight quarters entering the final bend.
PUNTERS BOLT (8) - checked and lost momentum first bend. Hampered entering the final bend.

column5: Owned/Raced by: Pave The Way Syndicate

column1: FICKLE MISTRESS (4) - jostled with HOMEBUSH ALEXEI in the run to the bend.
HOMEBUSH ALEXEI (5) - jostled with FICKLE MISTRESS in the run to the bend.
HOMEBUSH BOOTS (6) - checked off heels entering the bend. Awkwardly positioned on heels rounding the bend shifting up the track and hampering the progress of GOLDSTAR MAJOR.
GOLDSTAR MAJOR (7) - hampered and forced up the track rounding the bend. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury after falling to the track in the run to the lure.

BLACK ROUNDER (8) - awkwardly positioned to the outside of JINJA DYLAN rounding the bend being shouldered up the track and being dragged down by HOMEBUSH BOOTS in consequence. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury.
